name: Mr. Akun's Jump
description:
Mr. Akun's beloved basketball was accidentally lost, and it seems to have been left on the mountain peak where he visited last week. Could you please help Mr. Akun find his beloved basketball?

This game is a casual adventure game where players use the mouse to click on Akun to generate a parabola, allowing him to jump from one platform to another. The goal is to guide him to the highest peak to retrieve the lost basketball!

Click on Mr. Kun, drag the mouse to make him jump across the platforms following the parabolic trajectory.
